text: Vos non invenit people believe in DEUS Extremum Feria befriending those oppose DEUS His messenger et they est their parentes their infans their siblings their gens! Pro these He decretum faith their hearts supports them cum inspiration ex Eum admits them into gardens flowing streams wherein they abide forever DEUS pleased them they pleased EUM! These est party DEUS. multus assuredly deus party est winners
